name: Wiggle Cats (singleplayer beta)
description:
Wiggle Cats will be a massively multiplayer snake game. It's a replacement for Slither.io since that game has become so unplayably laggy and the fans (including me) are outraged! :o

In order to be less laggy, Wiggle Cats multiplayer will not be a browser-based Javascript game. (Although you can play the singleplayer in a browser if you really want.)

Currently only the singleplayer mode is implemented (with AI-controlled snakes).

Controls:

  • Aim with the mouse.
  • Boost with left click, right click, or the space bar.

Browser version (runs kinda slowly compared to the downloadable version): http://tayferret.com/wiggle_cats.php
